name: Thai Shrimp Cake - Tod Mun Goong
recipeInstructions: 1. Clean prawns, shell, discard heads and tails, and devein without slitting back.
2. Toss prawns in tapioca flour and wash under running water until clear.
3. Pat dry with a paper towel and flatten each prawn with a cleaver.
4. Put prawns in a mixing bowl and add pork fat, egg white, tapioca flour, soy sauce, salt and pepper. Knead to combine.
5. Add sesame oil and continue kneading the mixture by throwing it against the side of the bowl until stiff.
7. Roll the prawn mixture into a donut shape (about 80 grams each) and coat with breadcrums.
9 Remove from oil and drain on kitchen towel.
